alert.note: Alert for Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 8:40PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hancock, southern Lee and eastern Clark Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 837 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm in central Clark county near Kahoka, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Keokuk, Carthage, Nauvoo, Hamilton, Warsaw, La Harpe, Montrose, Wayland, West Point, Alexandria, Ferris, Colusa, Adrian, New Boston, Burnside, St. Francisville, Winchester, Plymouth, Denver and Fountain Green. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
